privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.txt_2: Welcome to OnlineLoans.Credit! Your privacy is important to us. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, and protect your information when you visit our website.

who.title: Who we are
who.txt_1: OnlineLoans.Credit is an affiliate website. We provide information and advertisements for lending companies in the United States. We are not a lender, broker, or financial institution and do not process or facilitate loans.

list.1: To improve our website’s content and functionality.

how.txt_1: We do not sell or share your personal information with unaffiliated third parties for their marketing purposes.

affilate.title: Affiliate relationships
affilate.txt: As an affiliate website, we advertise lending companies in the United States. Clicking on affiliate links or advertisements may redirect you to third-party websites. These websites may collect additional information or have their own privacy policies, which we encourage you to review.

cookies.title: Cookies and tracking technologies
cookies.txt: We use cookies and similar tracking technologies to enhance your browsing experience and analyze website traffic. By using our website, you consent to the use of cookies. You can manage or disable cookies in your browser settings, but some features of our website may not function properly if cookies are disabled.

third.title: Third-party services
third.txt: We may use third-party services, such as analytics tools (e.g., Google Analytics), to better understand user behavior and improve our website. These services may collect information about your use of our website and process it in accordance with their own privacy policies.

data.title: Data protection
data.txt: We implement reasonable security measures to protect your personal information from unauthorized access, disclosure, alteration, or destruction. However, no data transmission or storage system can be guaranteed to be 100% secure.

list.1: Opt-Out: You can opt out of receiving promotional emails by clicking the "unsubscribe" link in any email we send you.
list.2: Access and Update Information: If you wish to access, update, or delete your personal information, please contact us at Contact@OnlineLoans.Credit.

children.title: Children’s privacy
children.txt: Our website is not intended for individuals under the age of 18. We do not knowingly collect personal information from children. If we discover that we have collected information from a minor, we will delete it promptly.

links.title: Links to third-party website
links.txt: Our website may contain links to third-party websites. We are not responsible for the privacy practices or content of these external sites. Please review their privacy policies before providing any personal information.

updates.title: Updates to this privacy policy
updates.txt: We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time to reflect changes in our practices or for other operational, legal, or regulatory reasons. The updated version will be posted on this page with the "Effective Date" noted.
